summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the east 400 feet of the west 945' of that portion of the southwest quarter of the southeast quarter of Section 19, Twp. 26 No. Range 4 E. W. M., lying north of N. 128th St. except the west 100' thereof; with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-361.
